name: Shoot Brick Space Fire
description:
Shoot Brick Space Fire is a fast paced arcade game, in which you shoot blocks into the empty spaces of the wall.Enjoy various missions and addictively simple ball play control.
Take the addictive journey though time and outer space to break all the bricks and smash all the walls built by an alien race. Free the universe, be the best breaker & knock down all bricks!
